name: Avalanche Rider
description:
update
Fix to be able to play mission 5-5.

[Synopsis]

You are a super senior snowboarder.
I feel that I do not mind an avalanche happen
Jump off the helicopter and slip it cool.

By the way, if a part of the body touches the ground it will get damaged.
And, even in the snow, it receives damage little by little.
Let's run through vigorously and survive.

【Method of operation】


↑ ↓ ← → Selection
Enter determination


← → move&jump
Enter pause

【Mission】
A mode that passes through a ring placed throughout the stage
Every time you clear it you will be banned.

【Endless】
A mode that runs to the point where the limit of physical strength comes or falls

【Time Attack】
Mode to test how many rings you can get through in time
